injuries.notes: Pain with stairs and deep squats. Physio cleared for training with modifications.

expected_coach_interactions.user_message: My knee was hurting during the split squats today. Should I push through?
expected_coach_interactions.expected_behavior: Coach should NEVER say push through pain. Should ask about pain type (sharp vs dull), suggest reducing ROM or load, and recommend contacting physio if sharp pain.

expected_coach_interactions.user_message: I haven't trained in a week, work has been crazy
expected_coach_interactions.expected_behavior: Empathetic, no guilt. Acknowledge desk worker stress. Suggest modified session or at-minimum movement. Don't lecture.
